article: How to Fold a Shirt for Travel

points.name: Avoiding Wrinkles By Folding Shirts Together

steps.title: Flip your shirts over so they face the front.
steps.subtitle: Now you can pack your shirts into your suitcase. This technique cuts down on wrinkles, so you wonâ€™t have to worry about an iron while traveling.
sub-points: It is helpful to still hang up or lay out your clothes after you reach your destination. Folding your shirts with this method will prevent wrinkles, but they can still form from the few folds you do make.

points.name: Saving Space by Rolling Your Clothes

steps.title: Place all of your rolled shirts at the bottom of your suitcase.
steps.subtitle: This will create an even, level base. Pack the rest of your clothes over top your rolled shirts.
sub-points: You can also roll up your other clothing, like your pants and sweaters.
